channel.title: Comments on: Fix Execution Plan showing Parallelism
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: Absolutely! Or in some hardcore cases, the MAXDOP hint can be used over a server wide configuration change. Although until last week I had never used the hint in production. :)
item.content:encoded: Absolutely! Or in some hardcore cases, the MAXDOP hint can be used over a server wide configuration change. Although until last week I had never used the hint in production. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Grant Fritchey
item.dc:creator: Grant Fritchey
item.description: Besides, setting the cost threshold for parallelism to something higher than the default value of 5 is a much more useful change.
item.content:encoded: Besides, setting the cost threshold for parallelism to something higher than the default value of 5 is a much more useful change.
